author: controlcthenv
content: Would there be any chance to get EIP-4444 in time for Shanghai? I feel like it would be very valuable since EIP-4844 is strictly a blocksize increase, so EIP-4444 would also decrease full-node requirements to help alleivate the issues caused by the extra requirements from EIP-4844

author: pietjepuk
content: Don't think there's any consensus on 4844 being part of Shanghai yet. Otherwise I somewhat agree with the sentiment. My main point of contention being that storage is an easier requirement to satisfy than bandwidth, and EIP-4444 does nothing to alleviate the bump in bandwidth requirements
